#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    std::ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    int t,e,o;
    long long int tot,div;;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>e>>o;
        if((e+o)%5){
            cout<<"-1\n";
            continue;
        }
        else
        {
            tot=e+o;
            div=((2*tot)/5)-e;
            if(div<0)
                div=-div;
            cout<<div<<endl;
        }
    }
}
